SELECT b.board_no , u.user_nickname , b.board_category , b.board_title , b.board_content , b.board_date , b.board_hit , b.type_board , l.like_count , c.comment_count FROM TB_BOARD b , TB_USER u , (SELECT COUNT(user_Id) like_count, like_no FROM TB_LIKE WHERE like_type = 0 GROUP BY like_no) l , (SELECT COUNT(user_id) comment_count, board_no FROM TB_B_COMMENT GROUP BY board_no) c WHERE b.user_id = u.user_id AND b.board_no = l.like_no(+) AND b.board_no = c.board_no(+) AND b.board_status = 0 AND b.board_category != '공지사항'
AND l.like_count >= 5
AND b.board_category = #{board_category}
AND u.user_nickname LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
AND b.board_title LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
AND b.board_content LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
AND (b.board_title LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%' or b.board_content LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%')
ORDER BY b.board_no DESC

SELECT b.board_no , u.user_nickname , b.board_category , b.board_title , b.board_content , b.board_date , b.board_hit , b.type_board , l.like_count , c.comment_count FROM TB_BOARD b , TB_USER u , (SELECT COUNT(user_Id) like_count, like_no FROM TB_LIKE WHERE like_type = 0 GROUP BY like_no) l , (SELECT COUNT(user_id) comment_count, board_no FROM TB_B_COMMENT GROUP BY board_no) c WHERE b.user_id = u.user_id AND b.board_no = l.like_no(+) AND b.board_no = c.board_no(+) AND b.board_no = #{board_no}

SELECT l.like_type , l.like_no , l.like_group , l.like_step FROM TB_USER u, TB_LIKE l WHERE u.user_id = l.user_id AND u.user_nickname = #{user_nickname} AND (l.like_type = 0 OR l.like_type = 1) AND l.like_no = #{board_no}
